metadata.title: CVE-2019-13648 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel through 5.2.1 on the powerpc platform, when hardwaretransactional memory is disabled, a local user can cause a denial ofservice (TM Bad Thing exception and system crash) via a sigreturn() systemcall that sends a crafted signal frame. This affectsarch/powerpc/kernel/signal_32.c and arch/powerpc/kernel/signal_64.c.
